title: Holy moly, that ribbon is nice.

replies.body: Damn! congrats. I need to get one of those ribbons soon

> [{quoted}](name=Maraudaur,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=4cmEBEBj,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-05-21T23:44:39.835+0000)
>
> Damn! congrats. I need to get one of those ribbons soon

Who're you going to get it with? :p

I already had lvl 5 with Zed/cait/xerath/olaf/shyv...but the meta shifted so much since patch 6.9 that I hardly play those champs anymore.

It will probably end up being Kha/Swain/Leblanc/Ori/ some tank jungler yet to be defined.(if I can learn her)

But as you can see, my champ pool keeps changing as I climb ranked and the meta shifts. So who knows! I have 200 Mastery score though...

https://i.gyazo.com/d41e50c7bfbabe0c3185f3b80474c1ce.png?noredirect

Low Champion Points, but I split my number of Nidalee, Zac and Fizz games pretty evenly (all together it's about 160, 000).

I haven't even gotten a token yet {{sticker:zombie-nunu-tears}} 

Evelynn would look nice in that purple ribbon :((
Just be a tryhard every game. I just LOST and still got an S+ on Nidalee.
Don't have level 5 mastery on Sona yet, but apparently building full ap sona 'support' grants you an easy S.

Why do you only have 67k shouldn't you have way more being a one trick pony who has sold his soul to this game
